item.title: Computer Languages History by Éric Lévénez
item.description: “Two books on a desk near a MacBook with lines of code on its screen” by Émile Perron on Unsplash Amazing chart showing the history and lineage of programming languages by Éric Lévénez. Lots and lots of links to details for many of the languages listed.Originally published at tinyletter.com.
